title: Warning for SOLR-5522 (file/edit) should be removed from example solrconfig.xml
description:
In /SOLR-5522  the handler configuration code for the admin/fileedit request handler which would o allow modification of Solr Config files was removed from the example solrconfig.xml, but the comments were left in the example file.   New users may be confused by a warning about a possible security vulnerability which actually applies to a handler configuration that was removed from the example.

Patch coming as soon as I get an issue number

comments.author: Tom Burton-West
comments.content: Patch to example solrconfig.xml removes confusing comment
